Package phdl.exception

Exception Summary
AssignmentWidthException A class which represents an exception thrown when the widths of the vectors in a concatenation assignment do not match in the source phdl code.
DuplicateIdentifierException A class which represents an exception thrown when duplicate identifiers exist in the source phdl code.
DuplicateRefDesException A class that represents an exception thrown when duplicate reference designators have been constrained in the source phdl code.
ElectricalRuleCheckException Represents an abstract ERC (Electrical Rule Check) exception in phdl
InvalidPinListException A class that represents an exception thrown when an invalid pin list has been declared in the source phdl code.
MissingDecalException A class that represents an exception thrown when a device attribute list is missing a required decal (also referred to as a footprint) in the phdl source code.
MissingRefPrefixException A class that represents an exception thrown when a device attribute list is missing a required reference prefix in the phdl source code.
MultipleOutputDriverException A class which represents an exception thrown when multiple output drivers exist on a net in the source phdl code.
OutputDrivingInoutException A class which represents an exception thrown when an output pin and inout pin have been detected on the same net in the source phdl code.
OutputDrivingPowerException A class which represents an exception thrown when an output pin and power pin have been detected on the same net in the source phdl code.
OutputDrivingSupplyException A class which represents an exception thrown when an output pin and supply pin have been detected on the same net in the source phdl code.
PhdlException Represents an abstract phdl exception.
PhdlRuntimeException Represents a runtime exception in phdl.
SyntaxException Represents an abstract syntax exception in phdl
UndeclaredReferenceException A class that represents an exception thrown when an instance refers to a device or sub-design that has not been declared, or a net assignment refers to a net that has not been declared in the phdl source code.
UndefinedIndexException A class that represents an exception thrown when an indexable object is reference with an invalid index in the phdl source code.
UndrivenPinException A class that represents an exception thrown when a pin is undriven (floating) in the phdl source code.
